CutSceneText.Text: OK, I think we ought to be safe here.
Thank you. Something awful would have happened if you hadn't been here.
But Mikael Reol, there's something I need to tell you.
What?
It's no coincidence that you were attacked by a troll.
Are you saying the troll was specifically targeting me?
Yes indeed. And the whole thing was instigated by Yurid Jeridis.
My big brother?
Yes indeed. [%username] and I were nearly killed by him, but we managed to escape at the last minute.
My brother? I don't believe it.
Just think about it - why did they retreat first in the hunting area?
That cannot be. My brother isn't doing so well...
Seriously?!
It was all planned. I followed a trail from Yudeniel which confirms that the drug has been flowing into Tijerid.
While I was following this trail, one of our scouts saw this drug being delivered to Yurid.
Our scout was captured but he did manage to get a message to us.
A drug?
The exact ingredients remain a mystery. But one thing is certain. The monsters who take this drug grow much stronger and become extremely brutal.
I can't believe something like that exists... Ugh! My body...
Reol!
[%username], return to the castle with Reol immediately!
